short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use our extension to create holdings and import content into Clockwork Universe.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify content uploads and create holdings by integrating with LinkedIn or Crunchbase â€“ the ultimate shortcut to power Clockwork Universe!

This extension enables:

- Access to file and content uploads, for an easier integration with Clockwork Universe.
- Permission to upload holdings to Clockwork Universe.
- Clipboard access for copying and pasting holding information.
- Access to LinkedIn and Crunchbase profiles for data retrieval.
